      • addBinaryAnnotation

        public V1Span.Builder addBinaryAnnotation​(String address,
                                          Endpoint endpoint)
        Creates an address annotation, which is the same as Span.remoteEndpoint()

      • addBinaryAnnotation

        public V1Span.Builder addBinaryAnnotation​(String key,
                                          String value,
                                          Endpoint endpoint)
        Creates a tag annotation, which is the same as Span.tags() except duplicating the endpoint.

        A key of "lc" and empty value substitutes for Span.localEndpoint().

      • debug

        public V1Span.Builder debug​(@Nullable
                            Boolean debug)
        See Also:
        V1Span.debug()

        public V1Span build()
